speaker: Customer
text: You have reached the voicemail of John Smith. Please leave a message after the beep.

speaker: Agent
text: Hello John, this is Sarah from Clear Collections. I'm reaching out about your overdue balance on your account.

speaker: Customer
text: To leave a message, press one. To repeat these options, press two.

speaker: Agent
text: Please contact us at 1-800-555-0199 to discuss your options. We are here to help.

speaker: Customer
text: Thank you for calling. Your message will be delivered after the tone.
